channel.title: Comments on: From Tabletop to TV: DnD & RPGs

item.title: By: “Clementine Will Remember That…” aka Narrative RPGs – Luna Station Quarterly
item.dc:creator: “Clementine Will Remember That…” aka Narrative RPGs – Luna Station Quarterly
item.description: […] everything I’ve been telling you about DnD for the past year–about dice rolls and RNGs. Let all that talk of attack strength and weapons fade from your mind. Release the brain cells that […]
